text:
@DrRPNishank @narendramodi @AmitShah @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @HRDMinistry @mygovindia @transformIndia @PIB_India @MIB_India @DDNewslive #WakeupHRDpostponeNEETjee
Daily, nearly 20,000 #coronavirus cases are reported and still there is no clarification from Government whether the exam will be conducted or not. It seems like they do not care about our health. #fithaitouhithaiindia #FitIndiaTalks #PostponeNEETandJEE
